sentence: Parkland father Fred Guttenberg said this week that he believed that Republican politicians, including Florida Governor Ron DeSantis, bear some responsibility for Saturday's massacre at a Buffalo grocery store that is being investigated as a hate crime.
author: Khaleda Rahman
title: Parkland Father Blames Ron DeSantis, Other Republicans for Buffalo Shooting

author: Jon Skolnik
title: Doubling down on "great replacement" paranoia: How the right is reacting to the Buffalo shooting

sentence: Through political figures like Congresswoman Elise Stefanik and Governor Ron DeSantis.
title: Fire Tucker Carlson, Ben Shapiro and All Other Racists Who Promote "White Replacement Theory"
Tech companies removed the Buffalo shooting manifesto. A Texas law could make that illegal.

author: Taylor Penley
title: Nikole Hannah-Jones, others advocate for critical race theory in wake of Buffalo shooting

sentence: While Ron DeSantis and Greg Abbott, the governors of Florida and Texas, say they want to protect conservative points of view from liberal tech executives, the laws' texts seem to prohibit tech companies from removing or down-ranking all kinds of content that has nothing to do with electoral politics.
author: Farhad Manjoo New York Times
title: Bad ideas for fixing the internet have gone viral
